core

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.SimpleTreeNode
      • core.VNode
        • core.Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Directory, VirtualDisk

    public abstract class Container
extends VNode
    Extends VNode. This class represent a container node in the Virtual File System. It is extended to VirtualDisk and Directory.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • importDirectory

        public Directory importDirectory(java.lang.String path)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        imports a directory from the host file system to the reciver container node
        Parameters:
        path - to the directory on the host file system that will be imported
        Returns:
        a reference to the new Directory created
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case imported directory is missing
        exceptions.NoFreeSpaceLeftException - in case there's no free space left on the virtual disk that contains the reciever
